Dogs would have a new way to play and interact with their owners, as they could chase after balls and toys that were thrown higher into the air.
Dogs would be able to escape from danger more easily, as they could fly away from predators or other threats.
Dogs would have a new way to cool off on hot days, as they could fly to a shady spot or a cool body of water.
Dogs would be able to access new types of food and treats that were previously inaccessible, as they could fly to them.
Dogs would have a new way to exercise and stay fit, as they could fly for long distances and challenge themselves to fly up high.
